Package comp1721.cwk2

Class PokerHand

java.lang.Object
comp1721.cwk2.CardCollection
comp1721.cwk2.PokerHand
public class PokerHand extends CardCollection
A class to represent a 5 card hand.

Stores 5 Card objects which are all drawn from the Deck.

    • isFullHouse

      public boolean isFullHouse()
      Determines if hand is a full house.

      This is 3 of one rank and 2 of another.

      Returns:
      if the hand is a full house, true/false

    • isFlush

      public boolean isFlush()
      Determines if hand is a flush.

      This is all the same suit.

      Returns:
      if the hand is a flush, true/false

    • isStraight

      public boolean isStraight()
      Determines if hand is a straight.

      This is 5 consecutive ranks. This includes TJQKA as a high-ace straight

      Returns:
      if the hand is a straight, true/false

    • isPair

      public boolean isPair()
